main

Class InputApplicationReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.InputApplicationReader

  • public class InputApplicationReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the application file reader. An object of this class is required to read the application description xml file located in the app/ folder.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InputApplicationReader(java.lang.String fileName)
      Constructs an InputApplicationReader object.
      InputApplicationReader(java.lang.String fileName, javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
      Constructs an InputApplicationReader object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Parses the application file name and store the application traffic information in appropriate data structures.

      int getNumCore()

    • Constructor Detail

      • InputApplicationReader

        public InputApplicationReader(java.lang.String fileName)
        Constructs an InputApplicationReader object. It checks the file and instantiates all the required data structures.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The application file name.

      • InputApplicationReader

        public InputApplicationReader(java.lang.String fileName,
                      javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs an InputApplicationReader object. It checks the file and instantiates all the required data structures.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The application file name
        textArea - The multi-line area used in the GUI to displays the information about the application configuration loading.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the application file doesn't exist.
